objective.title: Eat something.
objective.description: I'm starving. I must find something to eat as soon as possible.

objective.title: Find this note's purpose.
objective.description: I don't remember aything. This note was inside my pocket. It says 'Memories'. I should try to find out what it wants to tell me.

objective.title: Find the key to the Abandoned House.
objective.description: This unknown man asked me to find the key for an abandoned house in exchange of his help.

objective.title: Meet that man again.
objective.description: Now that I have the key, I should go after that man. Maybe I should visit the Pub again.

objective.title: Go to the Hall.
objective.description: This journalist gave me a letter saying 'Go to the Hall, you might find something good there'. I guess I have no choice.

objective.title: Find the Mysterious Man.
objective.description: He definitely knows me. I barely had time to ask him before he cut me off. I need to find him.

objective.title: Investigate more about the "Cult of the Goddess of Death".
objective.description: I used to be a member at this institution, but I don't remember a thing about them. I should investigate them further.

objective.title: Investigate the murder of Amber Nikolsi.
objective.description: This crime sounds a bit suspicious, Jacob seems to know more than me about it, but at least he told me where the crime scene is, I should go check it out for myself.

objective.title: Find the suspect.
objective.description: That man is suspicious. He went into the crime scene and left, and was supposedly after something he lost. I have to find him.

objective.title: Follow the suspect.
objective.description: That man became even more suspicious. He is trying to escape from me. I'll follow him, but I must not be noticed.

objective.title: Escape.
objective.description: She seems serious about her threats. I need to get outta here, I need to find somewhere safe.
